elements.name: Successfully add a forward to an existing user team (Normal Flow)

steps.name: I have an existing user team with team name "MyAwesomeTeam" with 1 forward named "Joe Fresh"
I add a forward named "Eden Hazard" to the user team
the user team should have 2 players total

elements.name: Successfully add a goalkeeper to an existing user team (Normal Flow)

steps.name: I have an existing user team with team name "MyAwesomeTeam" with 1 forward named "Joe Fresh"
I add a goalkeeper named "Carey Price" to the user team
the user team should have 2 players total, with one goalkeeper and one forward

elements.name: Attempt to add a goalkeeper to a team already with one (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: I have an existing user team with team name "MyAwesomeTeam" with 1 goalkeeper named "Lebron James"
I add another goalkeeper to the user team
the attempt should not be successful and theres should only be 1 goalkeeper on the team

elements.name: Attempt to add a forward to a team already with five  (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: I have an existing user team with team name "MyAwesomeTeam" with 5 forwards
I add another forward to the user team
the attempt should not be successful and there should still be 5 forwards on the team

elements.name: Forward already exists on team (Error Flow)

steps.name: I have an existing user team with team name "MyAwesomeTeam" with 1 forward named "Sidney Crosby"
I add a forward named "Sidney Crosby" to the user team already with that player
the attempt should not be successful and there should still be 1 forward on the team

elements.name: Successfully create a new account (Normal Flow)

steps.name: no user with the username "cvatos" exists
I enter a valid username "cvatos"
I enter a valid name "Chris Vatos"
I enter a valid email "test@gmail.com"
I enter a valid password "test1235678"
I click on the create account button
the user with username "cvatos" should be created

elements.name: Username already registered to an account (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "abhiprav" exists
I enter a valid but existing username "abhiprav"
I enter a valid name "Abhi Praveen"
I enter a valid email "newEmail@gmail.com"
I enter a valid password "newPassword"
I click on the create account button to create a new account with an existing username
the user with username "abhiprav" should not be created

elements.name: Email already registered to an account (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: a user with the email "tom@gmail.com" exists
I enter a valid username "tomJones"
I enter a valid name "Tom Jones"
I enter a valid but existing email "tom@gmail.com"
I enter a valid password "otherPassword"
I click on the create account button to create a new account with an existing email
the user with email "tom@gmail.com" should not be created

elements.name: Provided password less than 8 characters (Error Flow)

steps.name: no user with the username "jerrySoccer" exists
I enter a valid username "jerrySoccer"
I enter a valid name "Jerry Seinfeld"
I enter a valid email "jerry@gmail.com"
I enter a valid password "invalid"
I click on the create account button to create a new account with an invalid password
the user with username "jerrySoccer" should not be created due to invalid information.

elements.name: The user successfully creates a new league

steps.name: the user is authenticated and on the Create League page
the user enters "Summer Championship" as the league name
the user submits the league creation form
the user should receive a confirmation message "League created successfully."

elements.name: Attempting to create a league with a name that already exists

steps.name: the user is authenticated and on the Create League page
the user enters "Summer Championship" as the league name
the league name "Summer Championship" already exists
the user submits the league creation form
the user should see an error message "League name already exists, please choose another name."

arguments.val: "League name already exists, please choose another name."

elements.name: Prevent a user from joining multiple leagues

steps.name: a user "JohnDoe" is already a member of "Professional Europa League"
a user "JohnDoe" tries to create a new league "Professional Chess League"
"JohnDoe" should see an error message saying "You are already in a league."

elements.name: Successfully create a new user team (Normal Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "kdach" exists when creating a new user team
I enter a valid user team name "MyNewTeamWeek1"
set it to active
I click on the create team button
the user team with name "MyNewTeamWeek1" should be created

elements.name: Name of new user team is empty (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "kdach" exists when creating a new user team
I enter an empty user team name ""
set it to active
I click on the create team button to try and create an invalid team
the user team with an empty name should not be created

elements.name: Manager already has another team that must be set to inactive (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "kdach" exists when creating a new user team
the user has already created a team with the name "ExistingTeam" and status active
I enter a valid user team name "NewTeamNewWeek"
set it to active
I click on the create team button to create another team
the user team with name "ExistingTeam" should be updated to inactive

elements.name: User requesting new user team does not exist (Error Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "rorymcilroy" does not exist when creating a new user team
I enter a valid user team name "RorysTeams5"
set it to active
I click on the create team button to try and create an invalid team
the user team with invalid manager should not be created

elements.name: Successful login (Normal Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "abhiprav" and password "password123" exists
I enter the valid username "abhiprav"
the correct, corresponding password "password123"
I click on the login button
I am redirected to the main dashboard for the associated account

elements.name: Unsuccessful login due to incorrect password (Alternate Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "abhiprav" and password "password123" exists
I enter the valid username "abhiprav"
the incorrect password "password987654321"
I click on the login button with an incorrect provided password
I am informed that password is incorrect

elements.name: Non-existing username unsuccessful login (Error Flow)

steps.name: a user with the username "oopmaLoompa" does not exist
I enter the valid username "oopmaLoompa"
the correct, corresponding password "chocolateFactory123"
I click on the login button with a non-existent username
I am informed that username does not exist

elements.name: Querying for a specific forward in the system

steps.name: that there is a forward "Cristiano Ronaldo" in the system
I query all forward
I am shown a list of all forwards that includes "Cristiano Ronaldo"

elements.name: Querying for a specific forward in the system

steps.name: that there is a forward "Lionel Messi" in the system
I query all forward
I am shown a list of all forwards that includes "Lionel Messi"

elements.name: Querying for a specific forward in the system

steps.name: that there is a forward "Robert Lewandowski" in the system
I query all forward
I am shown a list of all forwards that includes "Robert Lewandowski"

elements.name: Exact player position

steps.name: that there is a position "Midfielder" in the system containing players
I query players by position "Midfielder"
I am shown a list of players in that position that includes "Ngolo Kante"

elements.name: No matches

steps.name: that there are no players in the system playing as "Defender"
I query players by position "Defender"
I am prompted that no results were found

elements.name: Position not found

steps.name: that there is no "Goalpost" position in the system
I query players by position "Goalpost"
I am shown a no position found error

name: Query Players by Position
description:
In order to accurately find players for team selection
    As a user of the League Fantasy system
    I want to be able to search for players by their specific position or a partial match of their position

elements.name: Querying for a specific goalkeeper in the system

steps.name: that there is a keeper "Lev Yashine" in the system
I query keeper "Goalkeeper"
I am shown a list of all goalkeepers

elements.name: Querying for a specific goalkeeper in the system

steps.name: that there is a keeper "Mike Maignan" in the system
I query keeper "Goalkeeper"
I am shown a list of all goalkeepers

elements.name: Querying for a specific goalkeeper in the system

steps.name: that there is a keeper "Kepa Arrizabalaga" in the system
I query keeper "Goalkeeper"
I am shown a list of all goalkeepers

name: Query Goalkeepers by Position
description:
In order to find goalkeepers for team selection
    As a user of the League Fantasy system
    I want to be able to search for goalkeepers by their position

elements.name: Display all forwards in league

steps.name: that there is a league "PremierLeague" containing players
I select the "PremierLeague"
I am shown a list of all players in the league that includes "Haaland"

elements.name: Sort Players by Descending Order of Goals

steps.name: there exists in the system players "John Doe" with 5 goals and "Jane Smith" with 4 goals
I sort players by descending order of goals
I am shown a descending goals list that has "John Doe" ranked higher than "Jane Smith"

elements.name: Sort Players By Ascending Order of Goals

steps.name: there exists in the system players "John Doe" with 5 goals and "Jane Smith" with 4 goals
I sort players by ascending order of goals
I am shown a ascending goals list that has "Jane Smith" ranked higher than "John Doe"

elements.name: No players in the system

steps.name: no player is in the system goals
I query by ascending order of goals
I am shown a prompt indicating no results for ascending goals were found

elements.name: Exact player name

steps.name: that there is a player named "Lionel Messi" in the system
I query "Lionel Messi"
I am shown a list of players that includes "Lionel Messi"

elements.name: Partial match

steps.name: that there are players named "Harry Kane" and "Harry Maguire" in the system
I query "Harry"
I am shown a list of players that includes "Harry Kane" and "Harry Maguire"

elements.name: Player not found

steps.name: that the list of players in the system does not include any player whose name contains "Yassine Mimet"
I query "Yassine Mimet"
I am shown a prompt that indicates that no results were found

elements.name: Sort Players by Descending Order of Assists

steps.name: there exists in the system players "John Doe" with 5 assists and "Jane Smith" with 4 assists
I sort players by descending order of assists
I am shown a descending assists list that has "John Doe" ranked higher than "Jane Smith"

elements.name: Sort Players by Ascending Order of Assists

steps.name: there exists in the system players "John Doe" with 5 assists and "Jane Smith" with 4 assists
I sort players by ascending order of assists
I am shown a ascending assists list that has "Jane Smith" ranked higher than "John Doe"

elements.name: No players in the system

steps.name: no player is in the system assists
I query by ascending order of assists
I am shown a prompt indicating no results for ascending assists were found
